    • Method Detail

      • open

        public static Repository open(String path)
        Open a git repository.
        Parameters:
        path - the path to the repository
        Returns:
        the repo which that is opened
        Throws:
        GitException - git error.

      • init

        public static Repository init(String path,
                              boolean isBare)
        Creates a new Git repository in the given folder.
        Parameters:
        path - the path to the repository
        isBare - if true, a Git repository without a working directory is created at the pointed path. If false, provided path will be considered as the working directory into which the .git directory will be created.
        Returns:
        repo just initialized.
        Throws:
        GitException - git error.

      • initExt

        public static Repository initExt(String path,
                                 Repository.InitOptions initOpts)
        Create a new Git repository in the given folder with extended controls.
        Parameters:
        path - The path to the repository.
        initOpts - InitOptions
        Returns:
        Repo just created or reinitialized.
        Throws:
        GitException - git error

      • openExt

        public static Repository openExt(String path,
                                 EnumSet<Repository.OpenFlag> flags,
                                 String ceilingDirs)
        Find and open a repository with extended controls.
        Parameters:
        path - Path to open as git repository. If the flags permit "searching", then this can be a path to a subdirectory inside the working directory of the repository. May be NULL if flags is GIT_REPOSITORY_OPEN_FROM_ENV.
        flags - A combination of the OpenFlag flags.
        ceilingDirs - A GIT_PATH_LIST_SEPARATOR delimited list of path prefixes at which the search for a containing repository should terminate.
        Returns:
        repo just opened. This can actually be NULL if you only want to use the error code to see if a repo at this path could be opened.
        Throws:
        GitException - git error.

      • openBare

        public static Repository openBare(String path)
        Open a bare repository on the serverside.
        Parameters:
        path - Direct path to the bare repository
        Returns:
        Pointer to the repo just opened.
        Throws:
        GitException - git error.

        public Path workdir()
        Get the path of the working directory for this repository

      • setWorkdir

        public void setWorkdir(Path path,
                       boolean updateGitLink)
        Set the path to the working directory for this repository
        Parameters:
        path - The path to a working directory
        updateGitLink - Create/update gitlink in workdir and set config "core.worktree" (if workdir is not the parent of the .git directory)
        Throws:
        GitException - git error

      • mergeHeadForeach

        cb - Callback function
        Throws:
        GitException - git error

      • hashfile

        public Oid hashfile(Path path,
                    GitObject.Type type,
                    String asPath)
        Calculate hash of file using repository filtering rules.
        Parameters:
        path - Path to file on disk whose contents should be hashed. If the repository is not NULL, this can be a relative path.
        type - The object type to hash as (e.g. GIT_OBJECT_BLOB)
        asPath - The path to use to look up filtering rules. If this is NULL, then the `path` parameter will be used instead. If this is passed as the empty string, then no filters will be applied when calculating the hash.
        Returns:
        Output value of calculated SHA
        Throws:
        GitException - git errors

        public void setHead(String refName)
        Make the repository HEAD point to the specified reference.
        Parameters:
        refName - Canonical name of the reference the HEAD should point at
        Throws:
        GitException - git errors

      • state

        public Repository.State state()
        Determines the status of a git repository - ie, whether an operation (merge, cherry-pick, etc) is in progress.
        Returns:
        The state of the repository
        Throws:
        GitException - if returned code is not a valid state.

      • getNamespace

        public String getNamespace()
        Get the currently active namespace for this repository
        Returns:
        the active namespace, or NULL if there isn't one

      • setNamespace

        public void setNamespace(String namespace)
        Sets the active namespace for this Git Repository

        This namespace affects all reference operations for the repo. See `man gitnamespaces`

        Parameters:
        namespace - The namespace. This should not include the refs folder, e.g. to namespace all references under `refs/namespaces/foo/`, use `foo` as the namespace.
        Throws:
        GitException - git error
